text: Ara abasya'i amara musake amadera nidarsanasaha pathiyechilama [1] ebam balechilama, ‘apanara sampradayake andhakara theke alote niye asuna [2] ebam taderake allah‌ra dinagulora dbara upadesa dina [3].’ Ete to nidarsana [4] rayeche pratyeka parama dhairyyasila o parama krtajna byaktira jan'ya
